scripts.start: reveal-md -w  --theme night --highlightTheme hybrid --port 1337 --scripts script.js --css styles.css README.md
scripts.build: reveal-md  --theme night --highlightTheme hybrid --css styles.css --scripts script.js README.md --static dist
scripts.pdf: reveal-md  --theme night --highlightTheme hybrid --css styles.css --scripts script.js README.md --print slides.pdf
